item.title: 2023 年星巴克假日礼品套装中销售的四种带金属涂层的陶瓷杯被召回，原因是有报告称容器过热或破裂，可能继续造成伤害。
item.description:
Four types of ceramic mugs with metallic coating sold in 2023 Starbucks Holiday gift sets have been recalled due to reports of the vessel overheating or breaking, which could continue to result in injury. https://t.co/XZCTbUXXyb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 专家说，拜登政府为什么要对付大科技公司？在法院开展的这场运动反映了两党对庞大的科技公司势力日益增长的担忧。
item.description:
Why is the Biden administration going after Big Tech?

The campaign in the courts reflects a growing bipartisan consensus concerned about the power of sprawling tech companies, experts said. https://t.co/Y4pSyIoc02

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特在接受 "重大 "腹部手术两个月后，于上周五发布的一段视频中说，她被诊断出患有癌症，正在接受化疗。
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, was diagnosed with cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy, she said in a video message released on Friday, two months after she underwent "major" abdominal surgery. https://t.co/SjztVjyeKp pic.twitter.com/drSToQ3HDx

item.description:
Prince Harry and Meghan, The Duke and Duchess of Sussex, wished "health and healing" for Kate Middleton and her family in a statement after the Princess of Wales said on Friday that she was diagnosed with cancer after undergoing abdominal surgery. https://t.co/DJeyOQQ5R1 pic.twitter.com/dE3HTrNUMJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 据联合国称，向70%面临 "灾难性饥饿 "的加沙人发放的援助有限。一名以色列军官说，问题不在于进入加沙的援助数量，而在于援助到达后的分配。
item.description:
Aid distribution to the 70% of Gazans facing "catastrophic hunger" has been limited, according to the UN.

The issue is less the amount of aid entering Gaza than the distribution of that aid once it arrives, an Israeli military official said. https://t.co/w6DBO6tUC2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据俄罗斯外交部称，莫斯科发生枪击和爆炸事件，造成至少 40 人死亡，100 多人受伤。
item.description:
BREAKING: At least 40 people were killed and over 100 others were injured in a shooting and explosion in Moscow, according to the Russian Foreign Security Service.

Russia's foreign ministry called the shooting and explosion a "terrorist attack." https://t.co/7beQctvbuC pic.twitter.com/gYEM36CpFU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 据一位专家称，凯特决定等到周五才公开宣布自己的癌症诊断结果，很可能是出于保护孩子的考虑。
item.description:

item.description:
A Romanian court denied a request by online influencer Andrew Tate to return assets that were seized during investigations into the case in which he is charged with human trafficking, rape and forming a criminal gang to sexually exploit women. https://t.co/zpIaX62C21

item.title: 共和党众议员迈克-加拉格尔（Mike Gallagher）已宣布不再寻求连任，他宣布将于下月辞去国会职务，这将使共和党在众议院本已稀薄的多数席位进一步缩水。
item.description:
Republican Rep. Mike Gallagher, who had already announced he would not be seeking reelection, announced that he’s resigning from Congress next month — shrinking the Republicans' already razor-thin majority in the House. https://t.co/rqsDAnSXfA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统夸口说，美国的暴力犯罪已降至50年来的最低水平之一，但对一些美国人来说，对犯罪的看法却与统计数据相悖。
item.description:
Pres. Biden boasted that violent crime in the U.S. had plummeted to one of the lowest levels in 50 years — but for some Americans, the perception of crime is clashing with the statistics. https://t.co/OVsBC0uUwN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 佐治亚州共和党众议员马乔里-泰勒-格林（Marjorie Taylor Greene）已提出辞去议长职务的动议，威胁要在迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）升任议长仅数月后将其赶下台。
item.description:
Georgia Republican Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene has filed a motion to vacate the speaker’s chair, threatening to oust Speaker Mike Johnson just months after he ascended to the speakership. https://t.co/7KHlfb9AwQ pic.twitter.com/XnNvowxAnt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024
